text:
João Paulo dos Reis Veloso (July 12, 1931 – February 19, 2019) was a Brazilian economist and politician. He was Minister of Planning between 1969 and 1979, and also was the President of the Institute of Applied Economic Research. He was born in Parnaíba.
Veloso died on February 19, 2019 in Rio de Janeiro at the age of 87.
